title: Logigun 1.6
description:
This is: Logigun 1.6

"Portal-esque". Yeah, got this off The Debut 3 Bundle. Pretty easy at first thennnn the puzzles get pretty nuts. Interesting story too. Call it a physics-based puzzle platformer... with PONYTAIL PHYSICS!!!!!!!! JUST INSTALL IT ALREADY!!!
--------------------------------------

Description:
LogiGun is a Portal-esque puzzle-platformer about a girl named June as she climbs a tower filled with perplexing puzzles. Mix and match an array of neat guns to solve increasingly intricate physics challenges! Are you sharp enough to make it to the top? 

Key Features:
-Over 40 levels to traverse and solve! 
-Wield neat guns that let you create platforms at will, push and pull objects, -and much more! 
-Fully dynamic physics makes boxes move just like in the movies! 
-Use bombs, lasers, fire and gravity in crazy and inventive ways! 
-100% Combat-Free! 
-Loads of bizarre dialogue from some weird girl! 
-Ponytail physics!


--------------------------------------
*Absolutely 100% clean and working!*
*My upload ain't the best, but I'll seed this forever!*
*BUY the games you reallllly dig!!!*
